function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene in Victorian London","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading","Mitigation":"Improving sanitation and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, public health education","People":"Residents of Victorian London","Owner":"Local government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate public health infrastructure in the past","Impact":"Limited capacity to control contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in modern public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Health information systems, disease surveillance tools","People":"Community members, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies and healthcare organizations"}]}
